text: Django equivalent for count and group by
I have a model that looks like this:

code:
class Category(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=60)

class Item(models.Model):
    name = models.CharField(max_length=60)
    category = models.ForeignKey(Category)

text: I want select count (just the count) of items for each category, so in SQL it would be as simple as this:

code: select category_id, count(id) from item group by category_id

text: Is there an equivalent of doing this "the Django way"?
Or is plain SQL the only option?
I am familiar with the count( ) method in Django, however I don't see how group by would fit there.
